Quarter: The fiscal quarter in which the budget was allocated. This helps track the budget allocation over different periods.
Year: The fiscal year for the budget allocation. This is crucial for year-over-year comparisons of budget trends.
IT_Training_Budget: The total budget allocated for IT training in a given quarter. It is important for evaluating investment in employee skill development.
Impact_on_Security: Indicates whether the IT training budget was influenced by third-party data breach impacts. Useful for understanding budget adjustments related to security concerns.
Compliance_Certifications: List of compliance certifications held by the company during the budget period. Provides context on regulatory influences on budgeting.
Market_Position_Impact: Describes any impact on market position or competitive advantage due to IT training investments. Important for strategic planning.
